name: Mapping Transnational Cartels
description: Analyzing the operational structures and geographic reach of major global crime syndicates.

cards.title: Cartel Organizational Structures
cards.description: Understanding the hierarchy and operational framework of major crime syndicates.
bulletpoints: Crime syndicates often function with military-like hierarchy and discipline.
Different cartels specialize in various criminal enterprises (drugs, human trafficking, arms dealing).
Identifying power players, enforcers, and financial operators within a cartel network.
cards.summaryText: Chart militarized hierarchies, catalog crime specializations, and tag key operators inside the network.

cards.title: Tracking Cartel Expansion Strategies
cards.description: How global crime networks extend their influence across borders.
bulletpoints: Understanding cartel alliances and proxy groups in different regions.
Examining how illicit economies integrate into local political and business structures.
Identifying recruitment and radicalization techniques used by crime syndicates.
cards.summaryText: Analyze cross-border alliances, trace local political infiltration, and profile recruitment pipelines.

cards.title: Cartel Communication and Encryption Networks
cards.description: Analyzing how transnational syndicates maintain secrecy and coordination.
bulletpoints: Cartels rely on encrypted messaging platforms, burner phones, and dark web forums.
Understanding coded language and symbols used in cartel communications.
Tracking digital footprints without exposing investigative sources.
cards.summaryText: Document encrypted comm stacks, decode symbolic lexicons, and shadow footprints discreetly.
